scripts.project:build:development: pnpm clean:sdk && pnpm build:sdk && pnpm -r --filter=./packages/project* run build:development
scripts.project:build:testing: pnpm clean:sdk && pnpm build:sdk && pnpm -r --filter=./packages/project* run build:testing
scripts.project:build:production: pnpm clean:sdk && pnpm build:sdk && pnpm -r --filter=./packages/project* run build:production
